content.rendered:
Terms and Conditions

Terms of Use - "The Agreement"

By opening an account with FundQuest, you are entering into an agreement between FundQuest Financial Services Limited and you.

This agreement shall regulate the services provided by FundQuest Financial Services Limited (hereinafter referred to as ‘’FundQuest’’, ‘’the company’’ ‘’us’’ ‘’we’’ or ‘’our’’), a company duly registered in Nigeria with RC 1004646 and licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) to operate as a Finance Company with our registered office address at 235A, Ikorodu Crescent, Dolphin Estate, Ikoyi, Lagos State, Nigeria.

These Terms of Use (‘’Terms’’, ‘’Agreement’’) shall constitute a binding contract between FundQuest and You (‘’User’’ or ‘’Your’’).

By accepting this agreement, You agree to be bound by it. You have also agreed to our Privacy Policy and given consent to receiving electronic communication from the Company relating to Your account.
